entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
